```py
>>> idx.to_series()
animal
Ant      Ant
Bear    Bear
Cow      Cow
Name: animal, dtype: object 
```

```py
>>> idx.to_series(index=[0, 1, 2])
0     Ant
1    Bear
2     Cow
Name: animal, dtype: object 
```

```py
>>> idx.to_series(name='zoo')
animal
Ant      Ant
Bear    Bear
Cow      Cow
Name: zoo, dtype: object 
```
